name: SoulCalibur III
synopsis: Nightmare returns to wield the evil sword Soul Edge in Soulcalibur III. This new edition to a legendary franchise pits classic and new characters in lethal battles for the two legendary swords. Continue the timeless saga of these epic battles in the Tales of Souls mode. Delve deeper into the world of Soulcalibur by creating your own warrior in Character Creation mode and engaging in real time strategy battles in Chronicles of the Sword mode.
